parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of maximum number of records to obtain at a time.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the request to retrieve a new page of results. If NextToken is empty, the query starts from the beginning.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which you want to create the instance.

parameters.name: ResourceIds
parameters.description: The list of resource IDs. Number of array elements N Valid values: 1 to 1

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to cluster.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: An array of tags. The number of elements in the array. Valid values: 1 to 20.
